tag-2: We are building a diverse, equitable and inclusive bank with an equitable and inclusive culture where we proudly reach our fullest potential.
tag-3: A culture of inclusion means we feel empowered to contribute and be our authentic selves at work
tag-4: As a global bank, we have the unique strength of diverse backgrounds and perspectives from across the world.

tag-6: At Citi, we strive every day to create a diverse, equitable and inclusive workplace that all of our colleagues across the globe can be proud of.
